title: The Chaos Gambit
description: When high school students Nate and Wendee go looking for a future beyond slum life, they soon find themselves mixed up in an outlaw group that wants to change the world. Some call them terrorists, but in a bleak future where the economy is powered by war and greed, they're the only group willing to challenge the status quo. Armed with incredible Dimensional Manipulation technology and international resources, the group sets out to make a bold statement to the megacorporations--but when unexpected forces raise the stakes, the world stands ready to plunge into chaos... and for Nate and Wendee, their first mission may also be their last.
author: A.W. Burkhart
